meanings.definition: Resembling a bee in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The small, striped insect had a beelike buzz as it flew around the garden.
meanings.sent2: The beelike stripes on the flower attracted the attention of the bees.
meanings.sent3: The beelike costume made everyone at the party smile.
meanings.sent4: Her work ethic was beelike, always busy and focused.
meanings.sent5: The beelike drone of the lawnmower filled the air on a sunny afternoon.

meanings.definition: In a manner similar to that of a bee.
meanings.sent1: She moved beelike through the crowded market, swiftly and purposefully.
meanings.sent2: The children worked beelike together to build the sandcastle.
meanings.sent3: The dancer moved beelike across the stage, graceful and precise.
meanings.sent4: The cars on the highway moved beelike in a steady stream.
meanings.sent5: The students buzzed beelike around the library, searching for books.
